name: Showtek
description: '''Showtek''' is a Dutch [[electronic dance music]] duo consisting of two brothers from [[Eindhoven]], Wouter Janssen ({{IPA|nl|ˈʋʌutər  ˈjɑnsə(n)|lang}}; born 20 August 1982). and Sjoerd Janssen ({{IPA|nl|ɕuːr ˈtɕɑnsə(n)|lang}};{{efn|In isolation, ''Sjoerd'' and ''Janssen'' are pronounced {{IPA|nl|ɕuːrt|}} and {{IPA|nl|ˈjɑnsə(n)|}}.}} born 6 April 1984). The duo regularly manages to reach the top of multiple music charts and work with artists such as [[Tiësto]], [[Chris Brown]] and [[David Guetta]]. Showtek was ranked 17th in the [[DJ Magazine|Top 100 DJs list of 2014]] but by the magazine's 2016 list, they had dropped to 96th. The brothers, who have been musically active since 2001, also offer podcasts on their own radio show on the music streaming service [[iTunes]].
